'speaker_7': 'Is that correct? Absolutely. As you are aware, we just finished replacing 36,000 meters. We have a lot more data that we're dealing with. We're getting ready to launch a customer portal. We need somebody with a high degree of expertize to be able to monitor the health of the system.'

'speaker_7': 'We get alarms and we get notices that tamper validations that need to happen. We have meters that sometimes go silent. A lot of these issues we did have before with the old meters, we just had no visibility in them.'

'speaker_7': 'So for example, meter reading positions we did have three of those were now down to one. And then at the same time, though, there was a recognition that this is we're moving towards more of a technology focused platform with these smart meters.'

'speaker_7': 'also in operational efficiencies, other operational efficiencies. So for example, we have significantly less truck rolls right now.
